name: The Prosthetic Pirate
description:
A pirate with only one arm and one leg, what a lucky guy...

Gameplay:

In this game you can only hold one item at a time, swap between them to solve mind boggling levels.

Example of the game mechanics:

Controlls:

Move [Arrow keys]

Use Item [W]

Equip Item[E]

Drop Item [R]

Reset Level[Backspace]
